name: Quarantined 2600 (Demiero)
description:
Quarantined 2600 is an Atari 2600 reimagination of Viscerafest.

Shoot your way through enemies, collect keys to unlock your way to get the ring at the end to give it to your beloved. There are NO checkpoints and NO lives and the game is really difficult as a result. Are you up for a retro challenge?

Check out Viscerafest here:   https://store.steampowered.com/app/1406780/Viscerafest/
